actions.name: INCIDENT_FETCH_SUCCESS
actions.description: updates state with data from API

actions.name: DROPDOWN_PANEL_ITEM_CLICKED
actions.description: set the value of state.clicked with sys_id of clicked by user card incident

actions.name: DROPDOWN_PANEL_ITEM_CLICKED
actions.description: set the value of state.clicked with sys_id of clicked by user card incident and dispatches one of two actions according to clicked field in dropdown menu - OPEN_INCIDENT_CARD or DELETE_INCIDENT

actions.name: DELETE_INCIDENT
actions.description: delete incident from API by sys_id and dispatches INCIDENT_DELETE_SUCCESS

actions.name: RADIO_BUTTON_SET
actions.description: sets the value of radioBtnValue FILTER_START

actions.name: INPUT_FIELD_SET
actions.description: sets the value of input and dispatches FILTER_START

uiBuilder.label: Incident list component with modal window and filter
uiBuilder.description: Render, delete and filter incident cards from API
